header.v: Ngày hiệu lực giao hoặc trùng nhau.
header.e: The effective date range overlapped or duplicated.

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from dmvt where kieu_hd <> 0 and loai_vt in ('41', '51'))

field.name: ma_nl
field.check: ma_nl not in (select ma_nl from crdmnl)

field.name: ngay_hl_tu
field.check: ngay_hl_tu is not null and ngay_hl_den is not null and ngay_hl_tu > ngay_hl_den

text.v: Định mức sử dụng nguồn lực

processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @datetime0 datetime, @overlapped nvarchar(512) declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @i int, @k int, @currentID int, @count int, @voucherID varchar(8) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @i = 1, @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'CR1', @datetime0 = getdate() select @overlapped = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Ngày hiệu lực giao hoặc trùng nhau tại dòng %s.' else N'The effective date range overlapped or duplicated at row %s.' end if @admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'CRBillResource', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end -- Update update @@table set dvt_sp = b.dvt from @@table a join dmvt b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt where a.dvt_sp = '' update @@table set dvt = b.dvt from @@table a join crdmnl b on a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl where a.dvt = '' -- Check &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt_sp', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt_sp = b.dvt and (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt and a.dvt_sp = c.dvt where a.dvt <> '' and b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt_sp'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join crdmnl b on a.dvt = b.dvt and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl where b.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt_sp', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt_sp = b.dvt and (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt and a.dvt_sp = c.dvt where a.dvt <> '' and b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join crdmnl b on a.dvt = b.dvt and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl where b.dvt is null&Error; end if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from phnl b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp) select a.* into #k from @@table a join phnl b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp) -- Date if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', a.stt, 'C011' from @@table a where exists(select 1 from @@table b where b.ma_sp = a.ma_sp and b.ma_nl = a.ma_nl and (b.ngay_hl_tu = a.ngay_hl_tu or (b.ngay_hl_tu is null and a.ngay_hl_tu is null)) and (b.ngay_hl_den = a.ngay_hl_den or (b.ngay_hl_den is null and a.ngay_hl_den is null)) group by b.ma_sp, b.ma_nl, b.ngay_hl_tu, b.ngay_hl_den having count(b.stt) > 1) &w1;'ngay_hl_tu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C011'&w4; &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', a.stt, 'C011' from @@table a, @@table b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl and (a.ngay_hl_tu <> b.ngay_hl_tu or a.ngay_hl_den <> b.ngay_hl_den) and a.ngay_hl_tu <= b.ngay_hl_den and a.ngay_hl_den >= b.ngay_hl_tu &w1;'ngay_hl_tu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C011'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ngay_hl_tu', a.stt, 'C011' from @@table a, (select d.ma_sp, c.ma_nl, c.ngay_ct1 as ngay_hl_tu, c.ngay_ct2 as ngay_hl_den from ctnl c left join phnl d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl and (a.ngay_hl_tu <> b.ngay_hl_tu or a.ngay_hl_den <> b.ngay_hl_den) and a.ngay_hl_tu <= b.ngay_hl_den and a.ngay_hl_den >= b.ngay_hl_tu &w1;'ngay_hl_tu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C011'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table group by ma_sp, ma_nl, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den having count(stt) > 1&ErrorDate; select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a, @@table b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl and (a.ngay_hl_tu <> b.ngay_hl_tu or a.ngay_hl_den <> b.ngay_hl_den) and a.ngay_hl_tu <= b.ngay_hl_den and a.ngay_hl_den >= b.ngay_hl_tu&ErrorDate; select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a, (select d.ma_sp, c.ma_nl, c.ngay_ct1 as ngay_hl_tu, c.ngay_ct2 as ngay_hl_den from ctnl c left join phnl d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b where a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and a.ma_nl = b.ma_nl and (a.ngay_hl_tu <> b.ngay_hl_tu or a.ngay_hl_den <> b.ngay_hl_den) and a.ngay_hl_tu <= b.ngay_hl_den and a.ngay_hl_den >= b.ngay_hl_tu&ErrorDate; end &EndErrorMode; select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_nl, a.dvt, a.cach_tinh, a.cong_suat, a.tg_cai_dat, a.tg_bo_sung, a.so_ngay, a.ngay_ct1, a.ngay_ct2 into #d1 from ctnl a select @count = count(*) from @@table if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from phnl insert into #id1(stt_rec, ma_sp, stt) select '', ma_sp, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_sp select @k = count(*) from #id1 select @currentID = stt_rec from dmstt update dmstt set stt_rec = stt_rec + @count update #id1 set stt_rec = @wsID + replace(str(id + rtrim(@currentID) , 9), ' ', '0') + @voucherID insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_nl, a.dvt, a.cach_tinh, a.cong_suat, a.tg_cai_dat, a.tg_bo_sung, a.so_ngay, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den from @@table a join #id1 b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp order by a.ma_sp, a.stt select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt as dvt_sp, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so into #m1 from phnl a, dmvt b insert into #m1 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt_sp, c.nhieu_dvt, 1 from @@table a join #id1 b on a.stt = b.stt join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt update #m1 set he_so = b.he_so from #m1 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt_sp = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i1 from inl insert into #i1 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_sp) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_sp), '', a.ma_sp, a.stt from #id1 a select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_nl', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); end if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from phnl insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, min(a.stt) from #k a join phnl b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp group by a.ma_sp, b.stt_rec select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, a.line_nbr, a.ma_nl, a.dvt, a.cach_tinh, a.cong_suat, a.tg_cai_dat, a.tg_bo_sung, a.so_ngay, a.ngay_ct1, a.ngay_ct2 into #d2 from ctnl a insert into #d2 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_nl, a.dvt, a.cach_tinh, a.cong_suat, a.tg_cai_dat, a.tg_bo_sung, a.so_ngay, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den from #k a join #id2 b on a.ma_sp = b.ma_sp order by a.ma_sp, a.stt select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt as dvt_sp, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so into #m2 from phnl a, dmvt b insert into #m2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_sp, a.dvt_sp, c.nhieu_dvt, 1 from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt join dmvt c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_vt update #m2 set he_so = b.he_so from #m2 a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_sp = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt_sp = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_sp, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i2 from inl insert into #i2 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_sp) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_sp), '', a.ma_sp, a.stt from #id2 a join #k b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i2', '#d2', 'd$', 'ma_nl', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Update update phnl set @@list(master); from phnl a join #m2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete ctnl where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2) truncate table #d1 insert into #d1 select * from #d2 @@inserting(detail); update inl set @@list(inquiry); from inl a join #i2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end end
